players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Listen carefully to Bob's accusation."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him last night. Alice, are you sure you didn't see anything suspicious about Charlie's behavior?"
You: "Charlie, I think Bob is right. You seemed suspicious last night when you said nothing about Diana's death."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
